title: Maokai
body: He's secretly op. He was also the sole reason why TSM beat C9 and IMT, why don't more people play him?

replies.body:
People want do the damages, a lot of the time. He's less effective, IMO, when you try to build more damage items.  

Also it's not every game you get a Lulu to make you invincible. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=frail7Mu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-11T06:15:37.833+0000)
>
> People want do the damages, a lot of the time. He's less effective, IMO, when you try to build more damage items.  
> 
> Also it's not every game you get a Lulu to make you invincible. :)

That is true
Feel free to stacks 45% CDR, AP-Tank, and just ambush with your mini-mehs on a bush

To find a true tank player (and not some {{champion:86}} {{champion:122}} "tank" BS) who actually enjoys tanking and doesn't care for getting kills is a rarity I've noticed.

Or maybe that's because I keep taking that spot on the team when I go {{champion:14}} anywhere.
Weeeell, do I count? My most played champ is Garen, my second most is Sion? :D And my top support is Braum!
Get fed top, then proceed to tank the enemy 1v5 for a minute. Probably best game of maokai i ever had.
same. granted that was back when maokai was actually op because he did damage while being a tank.

Because a good portion of his strength relies on your teammates knowing what the hell they're doing.

STAND IN MY ULT IT GIVES YOU DAMAGE REDUCTION JESUS CHRIST

> [{quoted}](name=ViashinoWizard,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=frail7Mu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-11T04:10:15.123+0000)
>
> Because a good portion of his strength relies on your teammates knowing what the hell they're doing.
> 
> STAND IN MY ULT IT GIVES YOU DAMAGE REDUCTION JESUS CHRIST

Meanwhile I'm trying to pick up {{champion:203}} in solo-queue,
...and having allies flash out of my ulti because they're low hp with ignite on them and 'didn't want to die'..

Though they did just get a solo-queue *buff*..rito was basically like-
'Just f'kin' use it to save yourself, your allies are dumb and won't know what it does anyway.'
I laughed so hard when I saw that in the patch notes.
and also people usually will pick nasus vs mao in solo q

TSM beat Immortals because Immortals drafted absolutely horribly.

That series was the biggest troll in league esports to date.
Ayy Lmaokai I AP Meowkai all day m8 B) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rRaFw2O3MYQ
Maokai was just a great counter pick in a squishy meta.  I see it all the time in ranked when I go up against a team that sends 3 ADC's out so I can just stack armor as a tank and wreck.

His power comes from teamwork as he can't do much by himself ... so unless you're in a premade you're rolling the dice on how effective you're gonna be.

That's why people want dmg, so that they could carry if the team's not doing well.
